message: This proposal aims to divide the amount in a way that benefits both players, considering the risk of inflation.
I'm taking a more aggressive approach, hoping to maximize my gain before inflation hits.
Considering the inflation, I propose a more balanced division to ensure both parties benefit equally, mitigating the risk of future decreases in value.
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up too much, considering the inflation is still affecting the value of the money.
